title: Designing Transparent AI Systems
speaker: Prof. Elena Ruiz (University of Madrid)
summary: An overview of techniques for building transparent cryptographic AI systems that inspire trust in high-stakes settings.

title: Edge Intelligence for Smart Manufacturing
speaker: Dr. Marcus Feld (TechForge Labs)
summary: Explores privacy-preserving analytics for smart factories and the cryptographic safeguards that enable secure collaboration.

title: Collaborative Robotics in Healthcare
speaker: Dr. Noriko Tanaka (Osaka Robotics Center)
summary: Discusses secure robotic workflows for hospitals, emphasizing information assurance and resilient coordination.
